entry.title: It's soup season! This Saturday Yessenia and Gaby are...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

It's soup season! This Saturday Yessenia and Gaby are making Pozole with Sanctuary4All Colorado Solidarity Meals! It’s the perfect fall soup. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. All of the money raised will go to Lupe, who is recovering from surgery for renal cancer and a hernia. Pick up in Denver at Metro Caring from 1PM to 3PM.

entry.title: Yessenia and her husband Carlos from Sanctuary4All Colorado are...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Yessenia and her husband Carlos from Sanctuary4All Colorado are selling beef and vegetarian smothered burritos and flan this Saturday 10/9! If you’ve been looking for vegetarian green chile, don’t miss it. Pick up on Saturday at Metro Caring 1100 E. 18th Ave Denver 80218 from 1PM to 3PM. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: LAST DAY to place your orders for Beef Lasagna and Veggie...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

LAST DAY to place your orders for Beef Lasagna and Veggie Lasagna from Maria https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co/ Pick up is tomorrow in Denver at Metro Caring 1100 E. 18th Ave. Please support Maria, Sanctuary4All Colorado, and the Solidarity Meals program!

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Maria is selling food through Solidarity Meals for the first time this week. Support by liking, sharing, saving, and ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: Keep contributing, keep sharing🙌🏼 Celestial Alegría...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Keep contributing, keep sharing🙌🏼 Celestial Alegría #ReparationsNetwork

Celestial Alegría

#HappyFriday Today the Celestial Alegria Reparations Network is grateful to pay $500 of #reparations to Nicole Moore

Nicole is the owner of Compassionate Counse...ling of Denver and has also served Denver Public Schools, Childrens Hospital, Swallow Hill Music, University of Colorado, Colorful Colorado Collaborations, and countless community organizations in Denver. Nicole weaves ancestral healing, art therapy, and clinical psycho therapeutic modalities. Her focus on mental health in combination with holistic and energetic healing practices offer a unique combination of education, mobilization, and liberation through creative expression. She is a 4th year student of Nataline Cruz and Strawberry Moon Energetics, Holistic Healing & Traditional Medicine and received her BA in Sociology from CU Boulder, and Masters in Social Work from University of Denver. You can find Nicole painting, playing percussion, dancing, traveling, helping folks, and smiling ear to ear in her free time.

You can offer further reparations to Nicole via Venmo @Nicole-Moore-106

#BlackCounselor #BlackTherapist #BlackHealer #DefendBlackLives #BLM #BlackLivesMatter #BlackLiberation #ConfrontAntiBlackness #BlackAndBrownUnity #Solidarity #RacialJustice #CollectiveCare #Joy #Transformation #Healing

See More

entry.title: Maria is cooking with Sanctuary4All Colorado for the first time...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Maria is cooking with Sanctuary4All Colorado for the first time this week! She's making beef lasagna and veggie lasagna. Maria was featured in the documentary about the Solidarity Meals program from Wasteland of Wonder, check it out to see her and her daughter Edna in the kitchen. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co - pick up is at Metro Caring in Denver this Saturday from 1PM to 3PM. Please like, share, and save Sanctuary4All Colorado's posts to help spread the word!

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Maria is cooking with us for the first time this week! She was featured in the documentary about Solidarity Meals from @wastelandofwonder, check it out to see h...er and her daughter Edna in the kitchen. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co, and we always appreciate y’all liking, sharing, and saving our posts to help spread the word.

entry.title: Tania is selling delicious cheese enchiladas tomorrow Saturday...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Tania is selling delicious cheese enchiladas tomorrow Saturday 9/25 for Sanctuary4All Colorado Solidarity Meals! Place your orders NOW! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co/
Pick up at Metro Caring 1100 E. 18th Ave from 1PM to 3PM.

Sanctuary4All Colorado

Tania has been working towards obtaining her residency so she can stay in Denver with her children, mother, and siblings. She has built a life here with her fam...ily and they all plan to stay! Support her legal costs by getting some of her enchiladas this Saturday! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co/

entry.title: Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ DenverCelestial Alegría#HappyFriday Today the #CelestialAlegria #ReparationsNetwork is honored to pay...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ DenverCelestial Alegría

#HappyFriday Today the #CelestialAlegria #ReparationsNetwork is honored to pay $500 of #reparations to Keezy Allen

Malkeisha “Keezy” Allen is a non-binary queer... activist, educator and learner from Memphis, TN. They are currently a Juris Doctorate candidate at the Loyola New Orleans College of Law. They are committed to destroying all systems of oppression through work done with Black Lives Matter 5280 and other members of the community, and are always looking for people to partner with to make this happen.

Offer them further reparations via Venmo @keezy-allen or CashApp $malkeisha

#BlackActivist #BlackEducator #Nonbinary #Queer #LawStudent #DefendBlackLives #BLM #BlackLivesMatter #BlackLiberation #ConfrontAntiBlackness #BlackAndBrownUnity #Solidarity #RacialJustice #CollectiveCare #Joy #Transformation #Healing

See More

entry.title: Shout out to the wonderful #ReparationsNetwork via Celestial...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Shout out to the wonderful #ReparationsNetwork via Celestial Alegría🙌 Read below to see how YOU can contribute!

Celestial Alegría

#HappyFriday Today the #CelestialAlegria #ReparationsNetwork is overjoyed to pay $500 of #reparations to mona

mona is a mama, creatress, student/admirer of the... wild unknown, and a mover+shaker. Her small business, monsa.mariposa , is built on the foundation of slow living, respecting the natural law of impermanence, and self-love as a form of resistance. The online (and sometimes in person) pop-up provides handcrafted herbal healing potions + balms as well as handmade slow + functional fashion. Her intentions are to create goodies where ancestral knowledge + lush feminine essence can converge; creating fierce empowerment and an insatiable desire to honor oneself, the earth + Creator. mona currently dwells on stolen occupied land of the Takelma, Shasta and Klamath peoples.

You can offer more reparations to mona via Venmo @mona_mariposa or CashApp $monamariposa

#MonsaMariposa
#GoLushYourself #DefendBlackLives #BLM #BlackLivesMatter #BlackLiberation #ConfrontAntiBlackness #BlackAndBrownUnity #Solidarity #RacialJustice #CollectiveCare #Joy #Transformation #Healing

See More

Gaby has been an incredible advocate not only for herself but other families in sanctuary for all, she has helped other families cook their solidarity meals and... flyer the neighborhood about our events! We are so grateful to everything she brings to sanctuary for all, support her fight and help keep her here by ordering solidarity meals this Saturday! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

Gaby is selling potato tacos, chicken flautas and cheesecake this Saturday 9/18 for Sanctuary4All Colorado Solidarity Meals!! entry.title: Celestial Alegría's #ReparationsNetwork is live again! in...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Celestial Alegría's #ReparationsNetwork is live again! in tandem with the Confronting White Supremacy program that Celestial Alegría developed & SURJ Denver is facilitating. See below for more information & help spread the word🙌

Celestial Alegría

The #CelestialAlegria #ReparationsNetwork is officially relaunching starting this week!

The Reparations Network is a community funded action where together we ...raise $5,000 to offer $500 of reparations to 10 different Black leaders, healers, artists and organizations in our community.

I originally created this program to complement the Confronting Anti-Blackness program for Latinx and Chicanx folks that I run through my business. This fall I will be running the Reparations Network parallel to a Confronting White Supremacy training program I am working on in partnership with Bianca Mikahn and Showing Up for Racial Justice Denver.

Here is how you can take action today:
1. Give any amount via Venmo @Celeste-Martinez-129 or PayPal.Me/CelestialAlegria
2. Share with 5 people you know about this effort!
3. Learn more about #reparations from the platform created by the Movement for Black Lives

#DefendBlackLives #BLM #BlackLivesMatter #BlackLiberation #ConfrontAntiBlackness #BlackAndBrownUnity #Solidarity #RacialJustice #CollectiveCare #Joy #Transformation #Healing #LifeCoach #Organizer #Leader #Trainer #Consultant

See More

entry.title: Two of our friends with Sanctuary4All Colorado need our support!...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Two of our friends with Sanctuary4All Colorado need our support!

Lupe, who you may have met through solidarity meals, has had a recent cancer diagnosis, which her doctors only found because they were already keeping an eye on a hernia that they were delaying treatment of due to lack of insurance. Now, she is facing two challenging illnesses and is raising funds for medical costs and to support for her family while she recovers. Please consider contributing to her gofundme: https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…

Jeanette Vizguerra , who has been fighting for immigrant rights for decades, and from sanctuary for the last few years, was recently in a horrible car accident. While she recovers with her family, she will be unable to work for some time. If you can, please donate to her directly via Venmo @Sanctuary-4-All!

For the last year, Lupe has been suffering from an abdominal hernia. It’s be… Sofia Halpin needs your support for Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia Treatment

gofundme.com

Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia Treatment, organized by Sofia Halpin

For the last year, Lupe has been suffering from an abdominal hernia. It’s be… Sofia Halpin needs your support for Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia TreatmentFor the last year, Lupe has been suffering from an abdominal hernia. It’s be… Sofia Halpin needs your support for Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia Treatment

We hope you enjoy the long weekend! We'll be taking a break too but will be back September 11th with tamales and cake from Yessenia!

entry.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado Solidarity Meals program is moving! 🥳...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Sanctuary4All Colorado Solidarity Meals program is moving! 🥳 "We’re so grateful to have had the space at the First Unitarian Society of Denver for the last year. This week, we’re moving up the street to sell the same delicious food at Metro Caring. We’re so thankful for the space and excited to be working with them." Place your orders TODAY for gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co Pick up your orders at 1100 E. 18th Ave between 1PM and 3PM this Saturday 8/28. Metro Caring is hosting a pop-up market in their parking lot on the same day, come check it out!

We’re moving! 🥳 We’re so grateful to have had the space at the First Unitarian Society of Denver for the last year. This week, we’re moving up the street to sel...l the same delicious food at @metrocaring. We’re so thankful for the space and excited to be working with them. Order gorditas from Lupe at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co and come check out the new location!

entry.title: Spots are going fast for our "Confronting White...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver

Spots are going fast for our "Confronting White Supremacy" course that begins in a few weeks! If you're interested in SURJ Denver's 10-week racial justice and political education program in partnership with Celestial Alegría, please read more here: bit.ly/CWSprogram.

Register now: bit.ly/CWSregistration

If you can't attend, please consider donating -- 100% of funds raised will go to our partner, Celestial Alegría. Thank you for your generosity.

...

Cohort 1
Mondays, 12:00-2:00 pm
Sep 13 - Nov 15
(10 spots left)

Cohort 2
Tuesdays, 5:00-7:00 pm
Sep 14 - Nov 16
(only 3 spots left)

Commitment: We ask that if you register, that you can make the sessions each week. We know life happens, but this course asks for a commitment of a few hours a week going through the material and having conversations with your cohort. So please check your calendars, and if you know you are going to miss more than 1 week out of 10 weeks, please consider the other day, or wait for our next offering of this course. Thanks for your commitment to this work!

Course Description: This 10 week racial equity and political education training program focuses on how participants can confront their own internalized white supremacy and have access to skills in building relationships of solidarity and accountability with Black, Indigenous and People of Color. Each week participants will receive content prepared by Bianca Mikahn and Celesté Martinez (Celestial Alegría), then participate in weekly virtual community gatherings facilitated by the SURJ Denver team.

We'd love for you to join us!

See More

entry.title: Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ DenverCelestial AlegríaAre you a White person who wants to deepen your anti-racist work? Are you a...
entry.content:
Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ DenverCelestial Alegría

Are you a White person who wants to deepen your anti-racist work? Are you a White person who wants to be a part of a community dedicated to racial justice?

Sig...n up to participate in Confronting White Supremacy with Showing Up for Racial Justice - SURJ Denver this fall at bit.ly/CWSprogram

This 10 week racial equity and political education training program focuses on how participants can confront their own internalized White Supremacy and have access to skills in building relationships of solidarity and accountability with Black, Indigenous and People of Color. Each week participants will receive content prepared by Bianca Mikahn and Celesté Martinez, then participate in weekly virtual community gatherings facilitated by the SURJ Denver team.

#ConfrontWhiteSupremacy #DismantleWhiteSupremacy #EndWhiteSupremacy #DefendBlackLives #BLM #BlackLivesMatter #BlackLiberation #IndigenousSovereignty #Solidarity #RacialJustice #AntiRacism #Denver #Colorado #Training #Joy #Transformation #Healing #CelestialAlegria
